tool_description: Calculates optimal working tension and gauge requirements based on project type and yarn characteristics for consistent results.

desired_fabric_hand.description: Desired fabric feel (loose, relaxed, standard, firm, tight)

tool_size.description: Current needle or hook size in US sizing

error_messages: Unknown yarn type: Specify a recognized fiber type like wool, cotton, silk, alpaca, or synthetic blend.
Invalid yarn weight: Use standard categories: lace, light, DK, worsted, chunky, or super_chunky.
Unsupported technique: Project technique must be one of: knitting, crochet, weaving, or embroidery.
Invalid fabric hand: Desired hand must be one of: loose, relaxed, standard, firm, or tight.
Tool size out of range: If specified, tool size must be between 0 and 50 (US sizing).
usage: Provide yarn_type, yarn_weight, project_technique, and desired_fabric_hand. Optionally include current tool_size for tension adjustment recommendations. The tool calculates optimal gauge and tension for your specific combination.

recommended_gauge.description: Suggested stitches and rows per inch

optimal_tool_size.description: Recommended needle or hook size in US sizing

tension_description.description: How tight or loose to hold the yarn

swatch_instructions.description: Specific instructions for making a gauge swatch

adjustment_tips.description: Tips for achieving and maintaining proper tension
